ui.familiarslib.consumable_item_desc: Right click a Familiar to use
message.familiarslib.familiar_linked_to_: %s has been linked to this bed
message.familiarslib.familiar_unlinked_f: %s has been unlinked from this bed
message.familiarslib.not_bed_owner: You are not the owner of this bed
message.familiarslib.limit_familiars: You have reached the maximum limit of %d carried familiars!
message.familiarslib.cannot_break_wander: Cannot break storage block in Wander Mode! Switch to Store Mode first.
message.familiarslib.cannot_break_has_fa: Cannot break storage block with familiars inside! Remove all familiars first.
message.familiarslib.not_storage_owner: You are not the owner of this Familiar Storage
message.familiarslib.only_store_mode: You can only move familiars in Store Mode
message.familiarslib.player_familiar_lim: You have reached your familiar limit
item.familiarslib.familiar_spellbook.des: When equipped, this spellbook connects you with your tamed familiars, allowing you to share your magic attributes with them.
